name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior AI Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development and a strong focus on emerging AI technologies. Proficient in utilizing **Python** for building high-performance systems and integrating AI models utilizing frameworks such as **OpenAI**, **Hugging Face**, and databases like **Pinecone** and **Weaviate**. Adept in developing scalable systems with modern methodologies, leveraging **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js** for front-end integration, and implementing CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions**. Demonstrated ability to deliver impactful solutions in top-tier organizations including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, consistently enhancing system efficiency and performance.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed user interfaces and integrations using **React**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript** to enhance user experience and functionality.
Engineered backend services in **Python** using **FastAPI** to streamline document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows.
Created and deployed machine learning models utilizing **OpenAI**, **Anthropic**, and **Hugging Face** for intelligent data processing across applications.
Implemented asynchronous processing solutions with **Celery** and **Redis** to efficiently handle financial transaction requests, improving processing time by **25%**.
Managed infrastructure as code using **Terraform** during the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, reducing deployment times from hours to minutes.
Established data pipelines using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** for regulatory data exchange, ensuring data accuracy with over **99%** reliability.
Conducted security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to develop secure, scalable authentication systems supporting user access for up to **1000** users concurrently.
Utilized modern testing frameworks such as **Jest** and **Cypress** for unit and end-to-end testing, achieving a code coverage of **90%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address system integration challenges, ensure compliance, and oversee release strategies for smooth product rollouts.

Leveraged **Python** and **fastAPI** to develop scalable backend systems, focusing on efficiency in document workflows and user onboarding processes.
Utilized **Celery** and **Redis** for creating event-driven microservices, facilitating asynchronous processing of financial data and transactions with **99%** uptime.
Implemented deployment strategies for microservices on **Azure App Services**, employing **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, achieving consistent deployment across **3 environments**.
Engineered data pipelines integrating **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, optimizing the secure exchange of regulatory data and improving data flow efficiency by **40%**.
Conducted thorough security audits to ensure regulatory compliance and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication and access controls.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams for seamless system integration, ensuring compliance and overseeing successful release management, enhancing productivity by **20%**.

Developed AI-driven backend services using **Python**, **Go**, and **Flask** for trade execution, enhancing automated decision-making in portfolio management and account tracking.
Engineered real-time price feed processors with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to deliver trading data with latencies under **50ms**, optimizing high-frequency transaction capabilities.
Collaborated closely with frontend teams to deliver data through REST APIs and WebSocket channels, ensuring a seamless user experience with platforms built on **React** and **Next.js**.
Implemented regulatory compliance features, ensuring adherence to MiFID II and GDPR, while maintaining stringent internal data security protocols.
Developed comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **Jest**, and **Cypress**, achieving a **90%** code coverage that streamlined QA and CI processes for efficient development cycles using **GitHub Actions**.
Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management with a throughput increase of **300%**.
